title: Exotica with defective "F"
content:
Even the version at the designer's own download site ( [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/westwind/exotica.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525003402/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/westwind/exotica.htm)) has this anomaly. Since West Wind specializes in historic typefaces, it might simply be an all-too-authentic replication of a defect in the original model.   
   
To find out, you could email the designer at: [west\_wind@mailandnews.com](mailto:west_wind@mailandnews.com).
author: Mark Foster
